definition: (of a singer etc) excellent in voice and expression (idiom)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge

sentences.english: "Extremely rich" is the best performance of the feelings of the state.
sentences.chinese: “聲情並茂”就是感情狀態的最佳表現。

sentences.english: Rosie really knows how to belt out a song.
sentences.chinese: 羅琦的確懂得如何聲情並茂地演唱一首歌曲。

sentences.english: Teacher Jia'song is holiness, dignified and atmosphere, is remarkable for both voice and expression, moving true.
sentences.chinese: 賈老師的歌聲聖潔，端莊大氣，聲情並茂，真摯感人。
